0010010100110010 1001101011011010 0 -> sum: 1100000000001100, cout: 0
1001101010101101 1010010111101000 0 -> sum: 0100000010010101, cout: 1

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
